Title: CRM 2011 Silverlight Web Resource for User Settings
Description:
CRM 2011, Silverlight Web Resource for Editing User Settings

This utility allows a User with certain permissions to Update User Settings such as DefaultCalendarView, PagingLimit and ShowGetStartedPage
HomeWiki:
Project Description:
This utility allows a User with certain permissions to Update User Settings such as DefaultCalendarView, PagingLimit and ShowGetStartedPage.
Setup Instructions:
Managed Solution contains Web Resources and a custom Entity called “SystemUtil” (schema name: utility_systemutil). Once Managed Solution is successfully imported set the “Read” Permission on System Util entity. All the users having Read access on System Util can view the link under Settings -> System.

05/22/2011 - Uploaded next version CRMUtility_1_1_managed_V1.zip.zip

Highlights of this version
1. Editing of HomePageArea and HomePageSubArea is available.
2. It automatically reads Published SiteMap and reads values for Area and Sub-Area.
